三七二十一.definition: three sevens are twenty-one (idiom); the facts of the matter; the actual situation

三不知.definition: to know nothing about the beginning, the middle or the end; to know nothing at all

三九天.definition: the twenty seven days after the Winter Solstice, reputed to be the coldest days of the year

三自教會.definition: Three-Self Patriotic Movement, PRC government-sanctioned Protestant church from 1949

三芝.definition: Sanzhi or Sanchih township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

三芝鄉.definition: Sanzhi or Sanchih township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan

三茶六飯.definition: lit. to offer three kinds of tea and six different dishes; to be extremely considerate towards guests (idiom)

三藏.definition: Tripitaka, the three main types of text that collectively constitute the Buddhist canon of scriptures: sutras, commandments and commentaries

三藏法師.definition: monk who has mastered the scriptures; (esp.) Xuanzang 玄奘[Xuan2 zang4] (602-664)

三藩之亂.definition: Three feudatories rebellion against Qing 1673-1681 during the reign of Kangxi

三藩叛亂.definition: rebellion against the Qing of 1670s, pacified by Kangxi

三蘇.definition: the Three Su's (famous Song dynasty writers Su Xun 蘇洵|苏洵[Su1 Xun2] and his sons Su Shi 蘇軾|苏轼[Su1 Shi4] and Su Zhe 蘇轍|苏辙[Su1 Zhe2])

三號電池.definition: C size battery (PRC) (Taiwan equivalent: 二號電池|二号电池[er4 hao4 dian4 chi2]); AA battery (Tw) (PRC equivalent: 五號電池|五号电池[wu3 hao4 dian4 chi2])

三角帶.definition: V-belt (a type of drive belt with a trapezoidal cross-section)

三角板.definition: set square; triangle (for drawing right angles)

三言兩句.definition: in a few words (idiom); expressed succinctly

三言兩語.definition: in a few words (idiom); expressed succinctly

三貂角.definition: Cape San Diego or Santiao, easternmost point of Taiwan Island

三貞九烈.definition: (of a widow) faithful to the death to her husband's memory

三足烏.definition: three-legged Golden Crow that lives in the sun (in northeast Asian and Chinese mythology); Korean: samjog'o

三足金烏.definition: three-legged Golden Crow that lives in the sun (in northeast Asian and Chinese mythology); Korean: samjog'o

三足鼎立.definition: (idiom) to form a tripartite balance of power

三趾啄木鳥.definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian three-toed woodpecker (Picoides tridactylus)

三趾翠鳥.definition: (bird species of China) black-backed dwarf kingfisher (Ceyx erithaca)

三趾鴉雀.definition: (bird species of China) three-toed parrotbill (Paradoxornis paradoxus)

三趾鷗.definition: (bird species of China) black-legged kittiwake (Rissa tridactyla)

三跪九叩.definition: to kneel three times and kowtow nine times (formal etiquette on meeting the emperor)

三軍.definition: (in former times) upper, middle and lower army; army of right, center and left; (in modern times) the three armed services: Army, Navy and Air Force

三軍用命.definition: (of a team) to throw oneself into the battle

三農.definition: see 三農問題|三农问题[san1 nong2 wen4 ti2]

三農問題.definition: the three rural issues: agriculture, rural areas and peasants

三迭紀.definition: Triassic (geological period 250-205m years ago); also written 三疊紀|三叠纪

三退.definition: withdrawal from the Communist Party, the Communist Youth League, and the Young Pioneers of China

三道眉草鵐.definition: (bird species of China) meadow bunting (Emberiza cioides)

三都水族自治縣.pinyin: sān dōu shuǐ zú zì zhì xiàn
三都水族自治縣.definition: Sandu Shuizu autonomous county in Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南州[Qian2 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

三都縣.definition: Sandu Shuizu autonomous county in Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南州[Qian2 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

三鐵.definition: triathlon (Tw); (athletics) throwing events excluding the hammer throw (i.e. discus, javelin and shot put)

三長兩短.definition: unexpected misfortune; unexpected accident; sudden death

三門.definition: Sanmen county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

三門峽.definition: see 三門峽市|三门峡市[San1men2xia2 Shi4]

三門峽市.definition: Sanmenxia, prefecture-level city in Henan Province 河南省[He2nan2 Sheng3]

三門縣.definition: Sanmen county in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang

三阿姨.definition: auntie, third eldest of sisters in mother's family

三項.definition: three items; three events; three terms; tri-; trinomial, ternary (math.); triathlon (abbr. for 三項全能|三项全能)

三頭六臂.definition: lit. (having) three heads and six arms (idiom); fig. superhuman abilities; exceptional capability

三顧茅廬.definition: lit. to make three visits to the thatched cottage (idiom) (allusion to an episode in Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4] in which Liu Bei 劉備|刘备[Liu2 Bei4] recruits Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮[Zhu1 ge3 Liang4] to his cause by visiting him three times); fig. to make earnest and repeated requests of sb

三馬同槽.definition: three horses at the same trough (idiom, alluding to Sima Yi 司馬懿|司马懿[Si1 ma3 Yi4] and his two sons); conspirators under the same roof

三魂.definition: three immortal souls in Daoism, representing spirit and intellect

三魂七魄.definition: three immortal souls and seven mortal forms in Daoism, contrasting the spiritual and carnal side of man

三鹿集團.definition: Sanlu Group, Chinese state-owned dairy products company involved in the 2008 melamine poisoning scandal

三點水.definition: name of "water" radical 氵[shui3] in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85)
